q: Was the phishing attempt made via email, SMS, phone call, or another method? (Please state)
Did the caller or sender claim to be from a specific organization (e.g., bank, government agency)?
Did you share any personal information, OTP, credit/debit card details, or passwords? (Please state if any)
What type of account(s) was involved in the incident? (e.g., social media, banking, email, other)
Have any of your online accounts (e.g., email, banking, social media) been accessed without your permission?
Was the message or call from an official channel or source you had interacted with before?
Have you noticed any unusual behavior or activity on your devices after the incident?
Have you reported this phishing attempt to any relevant authorities (e.g., your bank, the platform, etc)?
